ygData.messageBody:
OK, but you spell like an man, so let me proofread it first.

Frankly, I don't WANT realism in my games. I LIKE being able to go
to the bank and have the same things everywhere. I LIKE teleporting
and jumping off of high places and gliding in over KC for a
landing.

I have a RL if I want realism.


*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********
